name: Power Push Pull
description:
Place gravity pads and move the cube to the goal in four levels. If you reached the goal, just remove the pad and let the cube fall down. The pads have to be removed and replaced quickly sometimes. But be careful: Falls the cube down or collides with a wall, you've to start over again!

This game was made for ZFXAction11 (http://zfx.info/viewforum.php?f=44)

Controls

Place push pad = Left Mouse Button (hold down for rotation)
Place pull pad = Right Mouse Button (hold down for rotation)
Remove pad = Middle Mouse Button (in v2 also with Space)
Restart = R
Mute audio = M
